product.graphics: a:1:{i:0;s:47:"4 Series Chipset Integrated Graphics Controller";}
product.description:
These superb HP Compaq 8000 Elite machines come complete with an Intel Core2 Quad CPU Q9505 @ 2.83GHz processor, 2GB of memory and a 160GB hard drive as standard.

Each PC comes with Windows 10 pre-installed, along with a recovery partition so that if your computer should ever start running slowly, you can restore it back to how it left our facility.

Your computer comes with a 90 Day Return to Base Warranty, so in the unlikely event that a fault occurs within your first three months, we will send a courier to collect your machine from you, repair/replace any faulty components and return the device back to you (once repaired) using a next day courier service at no extra cost.
product.name: HP Compaq 8000 Elite - Core2 Quad Q9505 2.83GHz - 160GB Hard Drive - 2GB Memory
product.amazonName: Refurbished HP Compaq 8000 Elite Core2 Quad Q9505 2.83GHz - 160GB - 2GB
product.amz_bullet4: Built in recovery partition to allow you to reinstall Windows if required
product.amz_bullet5: 3 Months Return to Base Warranty and Support
